parse.title: Akallabêth and other Tolkien Works (Collected Edition Score)

wikitext.*:
[[File:Akallabeth Score Cover.jpg|thumb|Score artwork by permission of David Brooke.]]
Zarathustra Music's 2020 published score of [[Paul Corfield Godfrey]]'s ''Akallabêth and other Tolkien Works'', which is a collection of Paul's smaller scale Tolkien works released on the album ''[[Akallabêth and other Tolkien works (Album)|Akallabêth and other Tolkien Works (Album)]]'' along with selections from ''Epic Scenes from The Silmarillion after the mythology of J. R. R. Tolkien'' (''[[Fëanor, Op. 46 (Opera)|Op. 46 - Fëanor]]'', ''[[Beren and Lúthien, Op. 47 (Opera)|Op. 47. Beren and Lúthien]]'', ''[[The Children of Húrin, Op. 48 (Opera)|Op. 48 - The Children of Húrin]],'' ''[[The Fall of Gondolin, Op.49 (Opera)|Op. 49 - The Fall of Gondolin]]'' and  ''[[The War of Wrath, Op. 71 (Opera)|Op. 71. The War of Wrath]])'' designed for concert performance.


This is a 140 page A4 sized book with full gloss covers. 


Cover Illustration: DAVID BROOKE ©2022

== Contents ==
''[[Akallabêth (for solo piano), Op. 42|Akallabêth]], Op. 42'' (piano)

''[[Tolkien Songs, Op. 9|Tolkien Songs]], Op. 9'' (voice and piano)

# Strider
# Song of the Eagle
# Fisherman's Song
# Drinking Song
# Song of the Prisoner
# Song of the Wanderer

''[[Shadow-Bride, Op. 36 (Song)|Shadow-Bride]], Op. 33'' (voice, viola and piano)

''[[Daeron, Op. 45 (Flute and Piano)|Daeron]], Op. 45'' (flute and piano)

Highlights from ''Epic Scenes from The Silmarillion after the mythology of J. R. R. Tolkien''

* ''[[Fëanor, Op. 46 (Opera)|Fëanor]]'', ''Op. 46''
** The Doom of Mandos (baritone and piano)
* ''[[Beren and Lúthien, Op. 47 (Opera)|Beren and Lúthien]]'', ''Op. 47''
** Love Scene (soprano, baritone, mixed choir, solo flute, piano)
** Beren's Farewell (baritone and piano)
* ''[[The Children of Húrin, Op. 48 (Opera)|The Children of Húrin]], Op. 48''
** All my deeds and past days (tenor and piano)
* ''[[The Fall of Gondolin, Op.49 (Opera)|The Fall of Gondolin]], Op. 49''
** The horns of Ulmo (tenor and piano)
** Wedding March (piano or harp)
** The Nameless Land (soprano, tenor, solo violin and piano)
* ''[[The War of Wrath, Op. 71 (Opera)|The War of Wrath]], Op. 71''
** To the Sea (tenor and piano)
** The Lay of Eärendil (tenor and piano)
** The Lay of Eärendil (mixed choir and piano)
